net.antidot.paf

Class VisitorFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.paf.Filter
      • net.antidot.paf.VisitorFilter

  • public abstract class VisitorFilter
extends Filter
    This class is pre-defined specialization of Filter which help to define processor filter. The init() method is optional and does nothing by default. The generate() does nothing and cannot be overriden.
    This class defines two methods:
    • collect(Document) : Called for each receive document and optional.
    • visit(DocumentQueue) : Called then the PaF ends with all the documents which have passed through the filter during the PaF life.
    The work() method is responsible to call the collect(Document) and the visit(DocumentQueue) and cannot be overriden.
    Version:
    7.4
    Author:
    Laurent Mazuel

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Filter
        The init method, which will be called one time at the beginning of the filter. At this step, the Scheduler will be not ready to give document to filters whith the Handle.receive() method. The main purpose of this method if to initialize the filter. Then, it is the best place to use the inherited Filter.configuration instance to set the correct state of the filter.
        Specified by:
        init in class Filter
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance

      • generate

        public final void generate()
        Description copied from class: Filter
        The filter method, which can be used to generate documents. The PaF will only exist if all the generate methods of all filters have existed their Filter.generate() method. Be careful of blocking this method.
        Specified by:
        generate in class Filter

      • work

        public final int work()
               throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Filter
        The work method during the PaF life.
        Specified by:
        work in class Filter
        Returns:
        the return code of the application.
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance

      • collect

        public void collect(Document doc)
             throws Exception
        Called for each document. Can be used to pre-computes some information during PaF life. Optional, does nothing by default.
        Parameters:
        doc -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • visit

        public abstract void visit(DocumentQueue docqueue)
                    throws Exception
        Called at the end of the PaF with all the documents which have passed through the filter during the PaF life.
        Parameters:
